      Set<? extends Permission> AbstractRBACManager.getAssignedPermissions​(String principal)
      returns a set of all permissions that are in all active roles for a given principal
      Set<? extends Permission> RBACManager.getAssignedPermissions​(String principal)
      Returns a set of all permissions that are in all active roles for a given principal.
      Collection<Role> AbstractRBACManager.getAssignedRoles​(String principal)
      returns the active roles for a given principal NOTE: roles that are returned might have have roles themselves, if you just want all permissions then use AbstractRBACManager.getAssignedPermissions(String principal)
      Collection<Role> AbstractRBACManager.getAssignedRoles​(UserAssignment ua)
      returns only the roles that are assigned, not the roles that might be child roles of the assigned roles.
      Collection<? extends Role> RBACManager.getAssignedRoles​(String principal)
      Returns the active roles for a given principal NOTE: roles that are returned might have parent roles themselves, if you just want all permissions then use RBACManager.getAssignedPermissions(String principal)
